issue.title: wideanglecamera sensor renders incorrect background color

content.raw:
great thanks, I'll create a pull request for this. It may have to go into `default` branch and not `gazebo7` as it may not be ABI compatible. I've started a [abi checker build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20ABI%20jobs/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/125/) to confirm this

Update:

[ABI report](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/125/API_ABI_report/) confirms the compatibility issue. So the changes will go into `default`
content.html:
great thanks, I'll create a pull request for this. It may have to go into default branch and not gazebo7 as it may not be ABI compatible. I've started a abi checker build to confirm this

Update:

ABI report confirms the compatibility issue. So the changes will go into default
